strings.Value: "We could lock all the ill in one place, and the problem would soon solve itself..."
"Even such measures might not help. We've no certainty how the disease spreads â€” from one person to another, or in some other way."
"I must admit that limiting the movements of those who are sick would indeed slow the disease's spread. But it doesn't follow that we should leave them without help."
"That's easy for you to say. Nothing sick will happen to your stinky dead face! But what if one of us gets sick?!"
"Your lips drip poison. You utter cruelties just to amuse yourself. But you do understand that this curse didn't begin with the sick, and it won't end with their deaths either."
